summary: Starter tier website plan for The Hair Emporium – a full‑service salon and boutique. Focus on a clean, fast template with minimal copy, basic sections that showcase services, boutique, and contact information.
sections: Services Overview (haircuts, nails, massages, tanning, eyelash extensions)
style_notes: Modern, minimalistic design using a neutral color palette (soft grays, whites) accented with a vibrant brand color (e.g., teal or coral). Use clean sans‑serif typography, generous whitespace, and high‑resolution images. Ensure responsive layout for mobile and desktop.
assets_needed: High‑resolution images of salon interior and staff
